login.message: Duya put yu fon nɔmba ɛn di lili tin we wi bin sɛn to yu.
login.error: Wi nɔ ebul si di sɔve. Duya chɛk di fon nɔmba ɛn di lili tin we wi bin gi yu bak. If yu stil de gɛt prɔblɛm na fɔ kɔl di Social Income Tim.

common.missingCredentials: Yu nɔ ebul go insay di sɔve. Duya rich awt to di Social Income tim.
common.authError: Yu de gɛt prɔblɛm fɔ lɔg-in? Duya rich awt to di Social Income tim.
common.loadingError: Yu de gɛt prɔblɛm fɔ opin di sɔve. Duya rich awt to di Social Income tim.
common.progressSavingError: Wi nɔ ebul sev yu ansa. Tray bak...,, If di prɔblɛm de kam fas fas, duya rich awt to di Social Income tim.
common.completed: Plɛnti tɛnki we yu dɔn dɔn dis sɔve.
common.alreadyCompleted: Faynali yu dɔn dɔn dis sɔve. Tɛnki tɛnki ɔ.
common.welcome: Wi dɔn mek dis sɔve fɔ fɛnɔt aw Social Income dɔn chenj yu layf. I go tek yu abawt 5 minit.

maritalStatusChoices.separated: Dɔn pat wit yu wɛf ɔ ɔsban

questions.hasDependentsTitleV1: Yu gɛt pipul dɛn we yu de tek kiya ɔf?
questions.hasDependentsDescV1: People who depend financially on you.
questions.nrDependentsTitleV1: Ɔmɔs pikin ɔ fambul yu gɛt we abop pan yu fɔ mɔni?
questions.employmentStatusTitleV1: Yu gɛt ɛni wok we yu de du naw?

employmentStatusChoices.selfEmployed: Yu de wok fɔ yu sɛf

questions.disabilityTitleV1: Yu gɛt ɛni kaynaba sik ɔ prɔblɛm we mek i nɔ izi fɔ fɛn wok ɔ we go mek i at fɔ kip yu jab?
questions.skippingMealsTitleV1: Tɛm kin de fas fas we yu ɔ ɛni yu fambul dɛn na yu os nɔ ebul it bikɔs mɔni nɔ de fɔ bay it?
questions.skippingMealsLastWeek3MealsTitleV1: Yu dɔn ɛva de las wik pas tri tɛm yu nɔ it?
questions.unexpectedExpensesCoveredTitleV1: Yu gɛt mɔni fɔ ɛniola we rich SLE 100 fɔ si dɔkta?
questions.savingsTitleV1: Yu ebul kip kɔpɔ rayt naw?
questions.debtPersonalTitleV1: Yu o ɛnibɔdi mɔni? (SLE 500 ɔ i pas dat)
questions.debtPersonalRepayTitleV1: Yu go ebul fɔ pe di mɔni we yu o?
questions.debtHouseholdTitleV1: Pɔsin de ɔnda yu ruf we o mɔni? (SLE 500 ɔ i pas dat)
questions.debtHouseholdWhoRepaysTitleV1: Na yu de pe fɔ dis pɔsin?
questions.otherSupportTitleV1: Ɛni ɔda say de we dɛn de ɛp yu wit mɔni?
questions.plannedAchievementTitleV1: Wetin yu op fɔ du wit Social Income oba di nɛks 3 iya?
questions.spendingTitleV1: Wetin na di men tin dɛn we yu de yus yu Social Income mɔni fɔ?

spendingChoices.education: Buk lanin (skul fi, not buk ɛn pɛn, tɛksbuk ...)
spendingChoices.food: Nyayam ɔ it (it fɔ yu ɔ di wan dɛn ɔnda yu ruf)
spendingChoices.housing: Os biznɛs (rɛnt, fɔ du smɔl smɔl wok pan di os ...)
spendingChoices.healthCare: Wɛlbɔdi biznɛs (dɔkta, fɔ go na ɔspitul, mɛrɛsin ...)
spendingChoices.mobility: Yu de tek transpɔr (bɔs, tausin, podapoda, kɛkɛ ...)
spendingChoices.saving: Yu de kip mɔni fɔ di bambay (yu de sev na yu bank akawnt ɔ na yu mobayl mɔni akawnt ...)
spendingChoices.investment: Invɛstmɛnt (fatilayza, gadin tul dɛm, dizul fɔ mashin...)

questions.spendingRankingTitleV1: Duya, rayt di nɔmba dɛn we de niya dɛn katɛgɔri we yu de yus yu mɔni pan, fɔ sho wi di wan dɛm we impɔtant pas ɔl fɔ yu
questions.spendingRankingDescV1: Yu kin drɛg di katɛgori ɛn put am ya.
questions.plannedAchievementRemainingTitleV1: Wetin yu op fɔ gɛt wit Social Income ɛnitɛm dɛn kam yu we?
questions.financialIndependenceTitleV1: Social Income dɔn mek yu fil se bɛtɛ de ɛn nɔbɔdi nɔ go put an ɔnda yu?
questions.impactLifeGeneralTitleV1: Ɔmɔs Social Income dɔn chenj yu layf?
questions.longEnoughTitleV1: Di tri iya we yu dɔn gɛt Social Income mɔni dɔn du fɔ manej pe fɔ wetin yu nid?
questions.achievementsAchievedTitleV1: Yu dɔn manej fɔ du wetin yu bin op fɔ du dɛn las tri iya?
questions.achievementsNotAchievedCommentTitleV1: Wetin mek yu nɔ bin ebul du am? Yu tink se wi bin ebul du sɔm ɔda tin fɔ sɔpɔt yu? (Fɔ ɛgzampul: tich yu sɔm skil dɛm, kɔnɛkt yu wit ɔda savis dɛm)
questions.happierTitleV1: Social Income dɔn mek yu gɛ alafiya?
questions.notHappierCommentTitleV1: Yu ebul tɛl wi wetin mek?
